Structs/DKServerError.html#/s:11Dropmark.name: statusCode
Structs/DKServerError.html#/s:11Dropmark.abstract: The network status code of the error response

Structs/DKServerError.html#/s:11Dropmark.name: identifier
Structs/DKServerError.html#/s:11Dropmark.abstract: The string identifer of the server error

Structs/DKServerError.html#/s:11Dropmark.name: message
Structs/DKServerError.html#/s:11Dropmark.abstract: The message the server returned with the error

Structs/DKServerError.html#/s:11Dropmark.name: init(response:data:)
Structs/DKServerError.html#/s:11Dropmark.abstract: Initialize an error from the server response.

Structs/DKKeychain.html#/s:11DropmarkSDK.name: user
Structs/DKKeychain.html#/s:11DropmarkSDK.abstract: The user stored in the device keychain. Use this variable to securely access user crendetials and data between app sessions.

Structs/DKKeychain.html.name: DKKeychain
Structs/DKKeychain.html.abstract: Dropmark-specific wrapper for KeychainSwift, providing encryption, decryption, and removal of an authenticated user object in the device keychain.

Structs/DKServerError.html.name: DKServerError
Structs/DKServerError.html.abstract: An error returned from the Dropmark API

Structs/DKResponseListAny.html.name: DKResponseListAny
Structs/DKResponseListAny.html.abstract: Similar to DKResponseListSerializable, the DKResponseListAny is a serializer that generates an array of objects of any type. This extension is useful when handling results from Dropmark’s /activity endpoint, which returns a variety of object types.

Protocols/DKResponseObjectSerializable.h.name: init(response:representation:)
Protocols/DKResponseObjectSerializable.h.abstract: Serializes a new instance from the provided network response and key-value representation. The representation is validated for the required parameters, then fills in optional parameters as necessary.

Protocols/DKResponseListSerializable.htm.name: DKResponseListSerializable
Protocols/DKResponseListSerializable.htm.abstract: When applied to classes in Dropmark’s model, a class conforming to DKResponseListSerializable can be serialized from JSON into an array of objects.

Protocols/DKResponseObjectSerializable.h.name: DKResponseObjectSerializable
Protocols/DKResponseObjectSerializable.h.abstract: When applied to classes in Dropmark’s model, a class conforming to DKResponseObjectSerializable can serialize JSON into an object instance.

Functions.html#/s:11DropmarkSDK2eeoiSbAA.abstract: Returns whether the two collections are equal.
Returns whether the two comments are equal.
Returns whether the two invites are equal.
Returns whether the two items are equal.
Returns whether the two users are equal.

Extensions/UTI.html#/s:11DropmarkSDK3UTI.name: itemType
Extensions/UTI.html#/s:11DropmarkSDK3UTI.abstract: Derive a Dropmark item type from a Universal Type Identifier.

Extensions/DataRequest.html#/s:9Alamofir.name: promiseObject()
Extensions/DataRequest.html#/s:9Alamofir.abstract: Generate a Promise from a DataRequest, returning an object of the inferred type.

Extensions/DataRequest.html#/s:9Alamofir.name: promiseList()
Extensions/DataRequest.html#/s:9Alamofir.abstract: Generate a Promise from a DataRequest, returning a list of objects of the inferred type.

Extensions/DataRequest.html#/s:9Alamofir.name: promiseListAny()
Extensions/DataRequest.html#/s:9Alamofir.abstract: Generate a Promise from a DataRequest, returning a list of objects of any type.

Enums/DKRouter.html#/s:11DropmarkSDK8DKR.name: authenticateAPIRequest(_:)
Enums/DKRouter.html#/s:11DropmarkSDK8DKR.abstract: To access API resources, an API token is required in the header of all requests. To authenticate with this function, first set the DKRouter.apiToken variable. Then pass a reference to a request through.

Enums/DKRouter.html#/s:11DropmarkSDK8DKR.name: authorizeUserRequest(_:)
Enums/DKRouter.html#/s:11DropmarkSDK8DKR.abstract: To authorize requests on behalf of a user, the user’s private token must be encoded and supplied in the Authorization header. To authorize a user’s request for the duration of the app session, set an authenticated user to DKRouter.user.

Enums/DKPlan.html#/s:11DropmarkSDK6DKPla.name: proBeta
Enums/DKPlan.html#/s:11DropmarkSDK6DKPla.abstract: All personal Dropmark features, plus beta features

Enums/DKPlan.html#/s:11DropmarkSDK6DKPla.name: proMonthly
Enums/DKPlan.html#/s:11DropmarkSDK6DKPla.abstract: All personal Dropmark features, paid on a monthly basis

Enums/DKItemType.html#/s:11DropmarkSDK10.name: image
Enums/DKItemType.html#/s:11DropmarkSDK10.abstract: Represents a data file such as a JPEG, PNG, or HEIC image.

Enums/DKItemType.html#/s:11DropmarkSDK10.name: video
Enums/DKItemType.html#/s:11DropmarkSDK10.abstract: Represents a data file such as a MPEG, MP4, or MOV video.

Enums/DKItemType.html#/s:11DropmarkSDK10.name: audio
Enums/DKItemType.html#/s:11DropmarkSDK10.abstract: Represents a data file such as a MP3, AAC, or WAV audio file.

Enums/DKItemType.html#/s:11DropmarkSDK10.name: link
Enums/DKItemType.html#/s:11DropmarkSDK10.abstract: Represents a string conforming to a URL scheme.

Enums/DKItemType.html#/s:11DropmarkSDK10.name: stack
Enums/DKItemType.html#/s:11DropmarkSDK10.abstract: Special case item that behaves as a parent to other items.

Enums/DKItemType.html#/s:11DropmarkSDK10.name: other
Enums/DKItemType.html#/s:11DropmarkSDK10.abstract: An item not conforming to any of the other item types. Oftentimes this is a data file in a proprietary format, such as a Sketch or Photoshop file.

Enums/DKItemType.html#/s:11DropmarkSDK10.name: init(mimeType:)
Enums/DKItemType.html#/s:11DropmarkSDK10.abstract: Derive a Dropmark item type from a file’s MIME type (such as image/jpeg).

Enums/DKItemType.html#/s:11DropmarkSDK10.name: init(filenameExtension:)
Enums/DKItemType.html#/s:11DropmarkSDK10.abstract: Derive a Dropmark item type from a filename extension (like jpg).

Enums/DKItemType.html.name: DKItemType
Enums/DKItemType.html.abstract: High-level item representations handled by Dropmark. Item types are expressed as strings, and are thus comparable and printable. Item types, Universal Type Identifers, MIMEs, and file extensions are tightly integrated in the Dropmark SDK.

Classes/DKUser/Status.html#/s:11Dropmark.name: active
Classes/DKUser/Status.html#/s:11Dropmark.abstract: A user retains the ability to act within Dropmark

Classes/DKUser/Kind.html#/s:11DropmarkSD.name: owner
Classes/DKUser/Kind.html#/s:11DropmarkSD.abstract: The owner of the collection can add, update, and delete collaborators, as well as alter the collection

Classes/DKUser/Kind.html#/s:11DropmarkSD.name: creator
Classes/DKUser/Kind.html#/s:11DropmarkSD.abstract: The creator originally created the collection, however ownership can be transferred thereafter

Classes/DKUser/Kind.html#/s:11DropmarkSD.name: manager
Classes/DKUser/Kind.html#/s:11DropmarkSD.abstract: A role assigned to users to administer the collection

Classes/DKUser/Kind.html.name: Kind
Classes/DKUser/Kind.html.abstract: When listing collaborators within a collection, a Kind represents a user’s role within the collection

Classes/DKUser/Status.html.name: Status
Classes/DKUser/Status.html.abstract: A user’s ability to act on the Dropmark platform

Classes/DKUser.html#/s:11DropmarkSDK6DKU.name: planIsActive
Classes/DKUser.html#/s:11DropmarkSDK6DKU.abstract: true if a paid membership is still active

Classes/DKUser.html#/s:11DropmarkSDK6DKU.name: billingEmail
Classes/DKUser.html#/s:11DropmarkSDK6DKU.abstract: The primary email address associate with the teams billing account

Classes/DKUser.html#/s:11DropmarkSDK6DKU.name: createdAt
Classes/DKUser.html#/s:11DropmarkSDK6DKU.abstract: The date the user created their account

Classes/DKUser.html#/s:11DropmarkSDK6DKU.name: avatar
Classes/DKUser.html#/s:11DropmarkSDK6DKU.abstract: The URL of the user’s avatar image

Classes/DKUser.html#/s:11DropmarkSDK6DKU.name: teams
Classes/DKUser.html#/s:11DropmarkSDK6DKU.abstract: A list of all teams of which the user is a member.

Classes/DKUser.html#/s:11DropmarkSDK6DKU.name: token
Classes/DKUser.html#/s:11DropmarkSDK6DKU.abstract: Used to authenticate requests on behalf of the user. Note: A token value only returns from the /auth API endpoint

Classes/DKUser.html#/s:11DropmarkSDK6DKU.name: init(id:)
Classes/DKUser.html#/s:11DropmarkSDK6DKU.abstract: Initialize a local instance with an ID

Classes/DKThumbnails.html#/s:11DropmarkS.name: mini
Classes/DKThumbnails.html#/s:11DropmarkS.abstract: URL for a mini thumbnail image, preserving the content’s aspect ratio

Classes/DKThumbnails.html#/s:11DropmarkS.name: small
Classes/DKThumbnails.html#/s:11DropmarkS.abstract: URL for a small thumbnail image, preserving the content’s aspect ratio

Classes/DKThumbnails.html#/s:11DropmarkS.name: cropped
Classes/DKThumbnails.html#/s:11DropmarkS.abstract: URL for a cropped thumbnail image, using a square aspect ratio

Classes/DKThumbnails.html#/s:11DropmarkS.name: uncropped
Classes/DKThumbnails.html#/s:11DropmarkS.abstract: URL for an uncropped thumbnail image, preserving the content’s aspect ratio

Classes/DKThumbnails.html#/s:11DropmarkS.name: large
Classes/DKThumbnails.html#/s:11DropmarkS.abstract: URL for a large thumbnail image, preserving the content’s aspect ratio

Classes/DKThumbnails.html#/s:11DropmarkS.name: croppedAnimated
Classes/DKThumbnails.html#/s:11DropmarkS.abstract: For GIF animations, a URL for a cropped thumbnail animation using a square aspect ratio.

Classes/DKThumbnails.html#/s:11DropmarkS.name: uncroppedAnimated
Classes/DKThumbnails.html#/s:11DropmarkS.abstract: For GIF animations, a URL for an uncropped thumbnail animation preserving the content’s aspect ratio

Classes/DKThumbnails.html#/c:@M@Dropmark.abstract: Returns an object initialized from data in a given unarchiver.

Classes/DKTeam/Usage.html#/s:11DropmarkS.abstract: The total amount of available data, in bytes

Classes/DKTeam/Usage.html#/s:11DropmarkS.name: usage
Classes/DKTeam/Usage.html#/s:11DropmarkS.abstract: The amount of data used by the team, in bytes

Classes/DKTeam/UserKind.html#/s:11Dropma.name: user
Classes/DKTeam/UserKind.html#/s:11Dropma.abstract: The current user is a collaborator on this team

Classes/DKTeam/Status.html#/s:11Dropmark.name: active
Classes/DKTeam/Status.html#/s:11Dropmark.abstract: A team retains the ability to act within Dropmark

Classes/DKTeam/Status.html.name: Status
Classes/DKTeam/Status.html.abstract: A team’s ability to act on the Dropmark platform

Classes/DKTeam/UserKind.html.name: UserKind
Classes/DKTeam/UserKind.html.abstract: The current user (as identified by the token supplied in the GET request) status within the team

Classes/DKTeam/Usage.html.name: Usage
Classes/DKTeam/Usage.html.abstract: Encapsulates the data usage metrics for a team

Classes/DKTeam.html#/s:11DropmarkSDK6DKT.name: email
Classes/DKTeam.html#/s:11DropmarkSDK6DKT.abstract: The primmary email associated with the team

Classes/DKTeam.html#/s:11DropmarkSDK6DKT.name: planIsActive
Classes/DKTeam.html#/s:11DropmarkSDK6DKT.abstract: true if a paid membership is still active

Classes/DKTeam.html#/s:11DropmarkSDK6DKT.name: billingEmail
Classes/DKTeam.html#/s:11DropmarkSDK6DKT.abstract: The primary email address associate with the teams billing account

Classes/DKTeam.html#/s:11DropmarkSDK6DKT.name: feedKey
Classes/DKTeam.html#/s:11DropmarkSDK6DKT.abstract: A unique key used to assemble a Dropmark feed URL. Learn more about Dropmark feeds here.

Classes/DKTeam.html#/s:11DropmarkSDK6DKT.name: usage
Classes/DKTeam.html#/s:11DropmarkSDK6DKT.abstract: The usage metrics of data for a team

Classes/DKTeam.html#/s:11DropmarkSDK6DKT.name: userKind
Classes/DKTeam.html#/s:11DropmarkSDK6DKT.abstract: The role of the current user (as identified by the token supplied in the GET request) within the team

Classes/DKTeam.html#/s:11DropmarkSDK6DKT.name: avatar
Classes/DKTeam.html#/s:11DropmarkSDK6DKT.abstract: The URL of the team’s avatar image

Classes/DKPermissions.html#/s:11Dropmark.name: admin
Classes/DKPermissions.html#/s:11Dropmark.abstract: true if the user holds administrator status over the collection

Classes/DKPermissions.html#/s:11Dropmark.name: edit
Classes/DKPermissions.html#/s:11Dropmark.abstract: true if the user can edit the collection’s items and metadata

Classes/DKPermissions.html#/s:11Dropmark.name: share
Classes/DKPermissions.html#/s:11Dropmark.abstract: true if the user can share the collection with the public

Classes/DKPermissions.html#/s:11Dropmark.name: leave
Classes/DKPermissions.html#/s:11Dropmark.abstract: true if the user can leave the collection

Classes/DKPermissions.html#/s:11Dropmark.name: delete
Classes/DKPermissions.html#/s:11Dropmark.abstract: `true if the user can delete the collection

Classes/DKItem.html#/s:11DropmarkSDK6DKI.name: id
Classes/DKItem.html#/s:11DropmarkSDK6DKI.abstract: The unique identifier of the item

Classes/DKItem.html#/s:11DropmarkSDK6DKI.name: collectionID
Classes/DKItem.html#/s:11DropmarkSDK6DKI.abstract: The unique identifier of the parent collection

Classes/DKItem.html#/s:11DropmarkSDK6DKI.name: collectionName
Classes/DKItem.html#/s:11DropmarkSDK6DKI.abstract: The name of the parent collection

Classes/DKItem.html#/s:11DropmarkSDK6DKI.name: parentID
Classes/DKItem.html#/s:11DropmarkSDK6DKI.abstract: The unique identifier of the parent stack

Classes/DKItem.html#/s:11DropmarkSDK6DKI.name: parentName
Classes/DKItem.html#/s:11DropmarkSDK6DKI.abstract: The name of the parent stack

Classes/DKItem.html#/s:11DropmarkSDK6DKI.name: name
Classes/DKItem.html#/s:11DropmarkSDK6DKI.abstract: The name of the item

Classes/DKItem.html#/s:11DropmarkSDK6DKI.name: descriptionText
Classes/DKItem.html#/s:11DropmarkSDK6DKI.abstract: Not to be confused with the NSObject description, this is the Dropmark-defined description of an item

Classes/DKItem.html#/s:11DropmarkSDK6DKI.name: content
Classes/DKItem.html#/s:11DropmarkSDK6DKI.abstract: Content may contain a multitude of types. Usually the content takes the form of a string, which may in turn represent a URL

Classes/DKItem.html#/s:11DropmarkSDK6DKI.name: link
Classes/DKItem.html#/s:11DropmarkSDK6DKI.abstract: A link to the content, external to Dropmark

Classes/DKItem.html#/s:11DropmarkSDK6DKI.name: preview
Classes/DKItem.html#/s:11DropmarkSDK6DKI.abstract: Undocumented

Classes/DKItem.html#/s:11DropmarkSDK6DKI.name: thumbnail
Classes/DKItem.html#/s:11DropmarkSDK6DKI.abstract: User-defined thumbnail image URL, if available

Classes/DKItem.html#/s:11DropmarkSDK6DKI.name: shareable
Classes/DKItem.html#/s:11DropmarkSDK6DKI.abstract: true if the item is available to share via a link

Classes/DKItem.html#/s:11DropmarkSDK6DKI.name: size
Classes/DKItem.html#/s:11DropmarkSDK6DKI.abstract: The size in bytes, if applicable, of the content

Classes/DKItem.html#/s:11DropmarkSDK6DKI.name: sort
Classes/DKItem.html#/s:11DropmarkSDK6DKI.abstract: Undocumented

Classes/DKItem.html#/s:11DropmarkSDK6DKI.name: type
Classes/DKItem.html#/s:11DropmarkSDK6DKI.abstract: The high level representation of the content. See the documentation of DKItemType for a richer understanding of when to reference an item’s type

Classes/DKItem.html#/s:11DropmarkSDK6DKI.name: mime
Classes/DKItem.html#/s:11DropmarkSDK6DKI.abstract: The MIME type as derived by Dropmark

Classes/DKItem.html#/s:11DropmarkSDK6DKI.name: location
Classes/DKItem.html#/s:11DropmarkSDK6DKI.abstract: If available, the location the item’s content was created

Classes/DKItem.html#/s:11DropmarkSDK6DKI.name: createdAt
Classes/DKItem.html#/s:11DropmarkSDK6DKI.abstract: The date the item was created

Classes/DKItem.html#/s:11DropmarkSDK6DKI.name: updatedAt
Classes/DKItem.html#/s:11DropmarkSDK6DKI.abstract: The date the last time the item was updated

Classes/DKItem.html#/s:11DropmarkSDK6DKI.name: deletedAt
Classes/DKItem.html#/s:11DropmarkSDK6DKI.abstract: The date the item was marked for deletion

Classes/DKItem.html#/s:11DropmarkSDK6DKI.name: reactionsTotalCount
Classes/DKItem.html#/s:11DropmarkSDK6DKI.abstract: The total number of reactions (or likes) recieved by the item

Classes/DKItem.html#/s:11DropmarkSDK6DKI.name: url
Classes/DKItem.html#/s:11DropmarkSDK6DKI.abstract: A link to the item on Dropmark. Note: The item must be shareable to view this link.

Classes/DKItem.html#/s:11DropmarkSDK6DKI.name: shortURL
Classes/DKItem.html#/s:11DropmarkSDK6DKI.abstract: A shortened link to the item on Dropmark. Note: The item must be shareable to view this link.

Classes/DKItem.html#/s:11DropmarkSDK6DKI.name: thumbnails
Classes/DKItem.html#/s:11DropmarkSDK6DKI.abstract: A suite of thumbnails generated by Dropmark

Classes/DKItem.html#/s:11DropmarkSDK6DKI.name: isURL
Classes/DKItem.html#/s:11DropmarkSDK6DKI.abstract: true if the content contains a URL. Note: Always test the content yourself, use this only for preview/UI rendering

Classes/DKItem.html#/s:11DropmarkSDK6DKI.name: tags
Classes/DKItem.html#/s:11DropmarkSDK6DKI.abstract: A list of tags applied to this item

Classes/DKItem.html#/s:11DropmarkSDK6DKI.name: metadata
Classes/DKItem.html#/s:11DropmarkSDK6DKI.abstract: Contains a range of other data associated with the item’s content. For example, an image item may contain the image’s EXIF data as a key-value set

Classes/DKItem.html#/s:11DropmarkSDK6DKI.name: items
Classes/DKItem.html#/s:11DropmarkSDK6DKI.abstract: If the item is a stack, this contains a list of child items. Usually this is used to temporarily store up to 4 child items for a quadrant thumbnail, not as a store of all children items.

Classes/DKItem.html#/s:11DropmarkSDK6DKI.name: itemsTotalCount
Classes/DKItem.html#/s:11DropmarkSDK6DKI.abstract: If the item is a stack, this is the total number of child items

Classes/DKItem.html#/s:11DropmarkSDK6DKI.name: user
Classes/DKItem.html#/s:11DropmarkSDK6DKI.abstract: The creator of the item

Classes/DKItem.html#/s:11DropmarkSDK6DKI.name: reactions
Classes/DKItem.html#/s:11DropmarkSDK6DKI.abstract: The reactions (or likes) the item recieved

Classes/DKItem.html#/s:11DropmarkSDK6DKI.name: comments
Classes/DKItem.html#/s:11DropmarkSDK6DKI.abstract: The comments the item recieved

Classes/DKComment.html#/s:11DropmarkSDK9.abstract: The unique identifier of the parent collection

Classes/DKComment.html#/s:11DropmarkSDK9.name: collectionURL
Classes/DKComment.html#/s:11DropmarkSDK9.abstract: The Dropmark link of the parent collection

Classes/DKComment.html#/s:11DropmarkSDK9.abstract: The date the the comment was last updated

Classes/DKCollection/ViewMode.html#/s:11.name: tile
Classes/DKCollection/ViewMode.html#/s:11.abstract: Render items as a grid of tiles

Classes/DKCollection/ViewMode.html#/s:11.name: flow
Classes/DKCollection/ViewMode.html#/s:11.abstract: Render items in a mason-style flow layout

Classes/DKCollection/SortBy.html#/s:11Dr.name: createdAt
Classes/DKCollection/SortBy.html#/s:11Dr.abstract: Sort by the date the collection was created

Classes/DKCollection/SortBy.html#/s:11Dr.name: updatedAt
Classes/DKCollection/SortBy.html#/s:11Dr.abstract: Sort by the date the collection was last updated

Classes/DKCollection/SortBy.html#/s:11Dr.name: size
Classes/DKCollection/SortBy.html#/s:11Dr.abstract: Sort by the number of items contained by the collection

Classes/DKCollection/SortBy.html#/s:11Dr.name: reactions
Classes/DKCollection/SortBy.html#/s:11Dr.abstract: Sort by the number of reactions contained in the collection

Classes/DKCollection/Kind.html#/s:11Drop.name: private
Classes/DKCollection/Kind.html#/s:11Drop.abstract: A collection (and it’s items) is only accessible by the owner and team members

Classes/DKCollection/Kind.html#/s:11Drop.name: public
Classes/DKCollection/Kind.html#/s:11Drop.abstract: A collection (and it’s items) is available through a direct link, but is not indexed for public search

Classes/DKCollection/Kind.html#/s:11Drop.name: global
Classes/DKCollection/Kind.html#/s:11Drop.abstract: A collection (and it’s items) is publicly available and indexed for search

Classes/DKCollection/Kind.html.name: Kind
Classes/DKCollection/Kind.html.abstract: Privacy of a collection (and it’s items) are determined by the Kind

Classes/DKCollection/SortBy.html.name: SortBy
Classes/DKCollection/SortBy.html.abstract: Sorting methods for child items. Note: This variable is maintained by the Dropmark API, and may differ from local sorting methods.

Classes/DKCollection/SortOrder.html.name: SortOrder
Classes/DKCollection/SortOrder.html.abstract: Render items in an ascending or descending fashion, as dictated by the sortBy variable.

Classes/DKCollection/ViewMode.html.name: ViewMode
Classes/DKCollection/ViewMode.html.abstract: Different styles of presentation of items, as maintained by the Dropmark API

Classes/DKCollection.html#/s:11DropmarkS.name: id
Classes/DKCollection.html#/s:11DropmarkS.abstract: The unique identifier of the collection

Classes/DKCollection.html#/s:11DropmarkS.name: name
Classes/DKCollection.html#/s:11DropmarkS.abstract: The name of a collection

Classes/DKCollection.html#/s:11DropmarkS.name: descriptionText
Classes/DKCollection.html#/s:11DropmarkS.abstract: Not to be confused with the NSObject description, this is the Dropmark-defined description of a collection

Classes/DKCollection.html#/s:11DropmarkS.name: kind
Classes/DKCollection.html#/s:11DropmarkS.abstract: The privacy setting of a collection (and it’s items)

Classes/DKCollection.html#/s:11DropmarkS.name: sort
Classes/DKCollection.html#/s:11DropmarkS.abstract: Undocumented

Classes/DKCollection.html#/s:11DropmarkS.name: sortBy
Classes/DKCollection.html#/s:11DropmarkS.abstract: Sorting method for items contained by the collection

Classes/DKCollection.html#/s:11DropmarkS.name: sortOrder
Classes/DKCollection.html#/s:11DropmarkS.abstract: Sort items by ascending or descending

Classes/DKCollection.html#/s:11DropmarkS.name: viewMode
Classes/DKCollection.html#/s:11DropmarkS.abstract: The type of view to render the items by

Classes/DKCollection.html#/s:11DropmarkS.name: thumbnail
Classes/DKCollection.html#/s:11DropmarkS.abstract: User-defined thumbnail image URL, if available

Classes/DKCollection.html#/s:11DropmarkS.name: labels
Classes/DKCollection.html#/s:11DropmarkS.abstract: Undocumented

Classes/DKCollection.html#/s:11DropmarkS.name: highlighted
Classes/DKCollection.html#/s:11DropmarkS.abstract: Returns true if the current user (as specified by the token in the network request) highighted this collection

Classes/DKCollection.html#/s:11DropmarkS.name: archived
Classes/DKCollection.html#/s:11DropmarkS.abstract: A collection can be archived to remove it from a user’s dashboard without permanently deleting it

Classes/DKCollection.html#/s:11DropmarkS.name: lastAccessedAt
Classes/DKCollection.html#/s:11DropmarkS.abstract: The date the user last visited the collection

Classes/DKCollection.html#/s:11DropmarkS.name: createdAt
Classes/DKCollection.html#/s:11DropmarkS.abstract: The date the collection was created

Classes/DKCollection.html#/s:11DropmarkS.name: updatedAt
Classes/DKCollection.html#/s:11DropmarkS.abstract: The date the last time the collection was updated

Classes/DKCollection.html#/s:11DropmarkS.name: itemsTotalCount
Classes/DKCollection.html#/s:11DropmarkS.abstract: A count of all items contained within a collection

Classes/DKCollection.html#/s:11DropmarkS.name: customDomain
Classes/DKCollection.html#/s:11DropmarkS.abstract: Undocumented

Classes/DKCollection.html#/s:11DropmarkS.name: usersTotalCount
Classes/DKCollection.html#/s:11DropmarkS.abstract: The total number of users and teams with access to this collection

Classes/DKCollection.html#/s:11DropmarkS.name: url
Classes/DKCollection.html#/s:11DropmarkS.abstract: A link to the collection on Dropmark

Classes/DKCollection.html#/s:11DropmarkS.name: shortURL
Classes/DKCollection.html#/s:11DropmarkS.abstract: A shortened link to the collection on Dropmark

Classes/DKCollection.html#/s:11DropmarkS.name: thumbnails
Classes/DKCollection.html#/s:11DropmarkS.abstract: A suite of thumbnails generated by Dropmark

Classes/DKCollection.html#/s:11DropmarkS.name: permissions
Classes/DKCollection.html#/s:11DropmarkS.abstract: Representation of which actions the current user can and cannot perform.

Classes/DKCollection.html#/s:11DropmarkS.name: user
Classes/DKCollection.html#/s:11DropmarkS.abstract: The creator of the collection

Classes/DKCollection.html#/s:11DropmarkS.name: users
Classes/DKCollection.html#/s:11DropmarkS.abstract: The collaborators associated with the collection

Classes/DKCollection.html#/s:11DropmarkS.name: items
Classes/DKCollection.html#/s:11DropmarkS.abstract: A list of items contained in the collection. Usually this is used to temporarily store up to 4 child items for a quadrant thumbnail, not as a store of all children items.

Classes/DKCollection.html#/c:@M@Dropmark.name: init(coder:)
Classes/DKCollection.html#/c:@M@Dropmark.abstract: Returns an object initialized from data in a given unarchiver.

Classes/DKCollection.html#/c:@M@Dropmark.name: encode(with:)
Classes/DKCollection.html#/c:@M@Dropmark.abstract: Encodes the receiver using a given archiver.

Classes/DKCollection.html.name: DKCollection
Classes/DKCollection.html.abstract: Collections are the main way things are organized in Dropmark. A collection has one owner, but has many items and users (AKA collaborators).

Classes/DKComment.html.name: DKComment
Classes/DKComment.html.abstract: Comments can be added to individual items.

Classes/DKItem.html.name: DKItem
Classes/DKItem.html.abstract: Items belong to a collection, can optionally belong to another item (a stack), and have many comments and reactions.

Classes/DKPermissions.html.name: DKPermissions
Classes/DKPermissions.html.abstract: In a collection, the permissions represent what actions the current user can and cannot perform.

Classes/DKReaction.html.name: DKReaction
Classes/DKReaction.html.abstract: Reactions are essentially a way for a user to Like an item.

Classes/DKTag.html.name: DKTag
Classes/DKTag.html.abstract: Tags are added to items and are a great way to organize items across many collections.

Classes/DKTeam.html.name: DKTeam
Classes/DKTeam.html.abstract: Teams are similar to a user account they have their own username, dashboard and subscription, but a team can be managed by multiple users.

Classes/DKThumbnails.html.name: DKThumbnails
Classes/DKThumbnails.html.abstract: Represents the available thumbnails for a collection or item.

Classes/DKUser.html.name: DKUser
Classes/DKUser.html.abstract: Represents a user on Dropmark. Can be the current user, collaborators, or users external to your team.

Classes/DKPagingGenerator.html.name: DKPagingGenerator
Classes/DKPagingGenerator.html.abstract: Use this class to load consecutive pages of content from a listable API endpoint. Includes utilities to check for new content while scrolling in a UICollectionView, UITableView, NSCollectionView, or NSTableView.
